attributes.action: Look after our Armerd Forces men and woman
attributes.additional_details: Whilst Labour wasted money on useless equipment, there seems to be no support within our goverment for our Armed Forces. A raise of the Mod budget, and sensible spending for what our service men and woman really need to be safe and carry out their jobs properly. We should be looking out for those giving their lives to protect our country not abandoning them.
